title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 1.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 1.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purpose of this Part: (a) The term department means the New York

State Department of Economic Development. (b) The term record means any information
kept, held, filed, produced or reproduced by or for the department. (c) The term records access officer means the
department' s assistant counsel designated pursuant to section
1.3
of this Part. (d) The term workday means the hours between
9 a.m. and 5 p.m. any day except Saturday, Sunday, a public holiday or a day on
which the department is otherwise closed for general business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
